channel.title: 2FA to Tray
channel.description: Most recent changes with links to updates.

item.title: 1.5 — Preserve clipboard, and switch accounts easier
item.description:
• Added a preference to preserve clipboard contents after auto-pasting (Works exclusively with text so far. Turned on by default)
  • Select accounts in status menu with CMD (⌘) + digit keys
  • Added a preference for automatically downloading updates. (Preferences > Check for Updates > Automatic updates) P.S. You still can check for updates manually by clicking the "Check for Updates" submenu item
